verses.verse: It happened after <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H7200>show<s%> yourself to <S%H256>Ahab;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>"
<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> himself to <S%H256>Ahab.<s%> The <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H2389>severe<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>
<S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> who was over the <S%H1004>household.<s%> (Now <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3966>greatly:<s%>

for it was <S%H348>so,<s%> when Jezebel cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H2244>hid<s%> them by <S%H376>fifty<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3557>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water.<s%>)

<S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> to all the <S%H4599>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and to all the <S%H5158>brooks.<s%> <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> we may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2682>grass<s%> and <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6505>mules<s%> <S%H2421>alive,<s%> that we not <S%H3772>lose<s%> all the <S%H929>animals.<s%>"

So they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> between them to pass <S%H5674>throughout<s%> <S%H256>it:<s%> Ahab <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H5662>himself,<s%> and Obadiah <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> way by <S%H1870>himself.<s%>

As <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> was in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H452>behold,<s%> Elijah <S%H7125>met<s%> <S%H5234>him:<s%> and he recognized <S%H5307>him,<s%> and fell on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is it <S%H113>you,<s%> my lord <S%H452>Elijah?<s%>"
He <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H3212>him,<s%> "It is I. Go, <S%H559>tell<s%> your <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H452><s%> 'Behold, Elijah is here!'"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Wherein have I <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> that you would <S%H5414>deliver<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> to kill <S%H4191>me?<s%>

As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> there is <S%H3426>no<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> or <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H559>you.<s%> When they said, <S%H7650><s%> 'He is not here,' he took an oath of the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that they <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find you.
Now you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Go, <S%H559>tell<s%> your <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H452>"Behold,<s%> Elijah is here."'

It will <S%H3212>happen,<s%> as soon as I am gone from <S%H7307>you,<s%> that the Spirit of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5375>carry<s%> you I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H935>where;<s%> and so when I come and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and he <S%H4672>can't<s%> find <S%H2026>you,<s%> he will kill <S%H5650>me.<s%> But I, your servant, have <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H5046>Wasn't<s%> it told my <S%H113>lord<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how I <S%H2244>hid<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with <S%H2572>fifty<s%> to a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3557>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water?<s%>
Now you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Go, <S%H559>tell<s%> your <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H452>"Behold,<s%> Elijah is <S%H2026>here;<s%>"' and he will kill me."

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> I will surely <S%H7200>show<s%> myself to him <S%H3117>today.<s%>"
So <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H256>him;<s%> and Ahab <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>
It <S%H256>happened,<s%> when Ahab <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> that <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5916>him,<s%> "Is that you, you troubler of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>"

He <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I have not <S%H5916>troubled<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but <S%H1>you,<s%> and your father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> in that you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and you have <S%H3212>followed<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H7971>send,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> to me all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H842>Asherah,<s%> who <S%H398>eat<s%> at <S%H348>Jezebel<s%>'s <S%H7979>table.<s%>"

So <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> near to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "How <S%H5921>long<s%> will you <S%H6452>waver<s%> between the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3068>sides?<s%> If Yahweh is <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H1168>him;<s%> but if Baal, then <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H5971>him.<s%>" The people <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not a <S%H1697>word.<s%>

Then <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3498>"I,<s%> even I only, am left a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but <S%H1168>Baal<s%>'s <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Let them therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6499>bulls;<s%> and let them <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for <S%H5408>themselves,<s%> and cut it in pieces, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> it on the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> no <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6213>under;<s%> and I will dress the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it on the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> no fire under <S%H784>it.<s%>

You <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>god,<s%> and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H6030>answers<s%> by <S%H784>fire,<s%> let him be <S%H430>God.<s%>" All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"It<s%> is <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H6030>said.<s%>"

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H977>"Choose<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for <S%H6213>yourselves,<s%> and dress it <S%H7223>first;<s%> for you are <S%H7227>many;<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>god,<s%> but <S%H7760>put<s%> no fire under <S%H784>it.<s%>"

They <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> which was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> and they dressed <S%H7121>it,<s%> and called on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from <S%H1242>morning<s%> even until <S%H6672>noon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H369>us.<s%> But there was no <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor any who <S%H6030>answered.<s%> They <S%H6452>leaped<s%> about the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which was <S%H6213>made.<s%>

It happened at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H2048>mocked<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> and said, <S%H7121>"Cry<s%> <S%H1419>aloud;<s%> for he is a <S%H430>god.<s%> Either he is <S%H7879>musing,<s%> or he has gone <S%H7873>aside,<s%> or he is on a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> or <S%H194>perhaps<s%> he <S%H3463>sleeps<s%> and must be <S%H3364>awakened.<s%>"

They <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H6963>aloud,<s%> and <S%H1413>cut<s%> themselves in their <S%H4941>way<s%> with <S%H2719>knives<s%> and <S%H7420>lances,<s%> until the <S%H1818>blood<s%> gushed out on <S%H8210>them.<s%>

It was <S%H6672>so,<s%> when midday was <S%H5674>past,<s%> that they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> until the time of the <S%H5927>offering<s%> of the <S%H5927>offering;<s%> but there was neither <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor any to <S%H6030>answer,<s%> nor any who <S%H7182>regarded.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H5971>me;<s%>" and all the people came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7495>him.<s%> He repaired the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that was thrown <S%H2040>down.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to whom the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>came,<s%> saying, <S%H3478>"Israel<s%> shall be your <S%H8034>name.<s%>"

With the <S%H68>stones<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H8585>trench<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> large enough to <S%H1004>contain<s%> two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

He <S%H6186>put<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order,<s%> and <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> in <S%H7760>pieces,<s%> and laid it on the <S%H6086>wood.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4390>"Fill<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3537>jars<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and on the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do it a second <S%H8138>time;<s%>" and they did it the second <S%H8138>time.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do it a third <S%H8138>time;<s%>" and they did it the third <S%H8027>time.<s%>
The <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3212>ran<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and he also <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H8585>trench<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

It happened at the time of the <S%H5927>offering<s%> of the <S%H4503>offering,<s%> that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let it be <S%H3045>known<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> that you are <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that I am your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> all these things at your <S%H1697>word.<s%>

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H5971>me,<s%> that this people may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, are <S%H430>God,<s%> and that you have <S%H5437>turned<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5437>back<s%> <S%H322>again.<s%>"

Then the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H68>stones,<s%> and the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and licked <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> that was in the <S%H8585>trench.<s%>

When all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5307>it,<s%> they fell on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%> They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> he is <S%H430>God!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he is <S%H430>God!<s%>"

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8610>them,<s%> "Seize the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal!<s%> <S%H376>Don't<s%> let one of them <S%H4422>escape!<s%>" They <S%H8610>seized<s%> <S%H452>them.<s%> Elijah brought them <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon,<s%> and killed them <S%H7819>there.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> "Get <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink;<s%> for there is the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of <S%H1653>rain.<s%>"

So <S%H256>Ahab<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink.<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel;<s%> and he bowed himself <S%H1457>down<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> between his <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5027>now,<s%> look <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>" He went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "There is <S%H3972>nothing.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H7725>again<s%>" <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

It happened at the seventh <S%H7637>time,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6996>"Behold,<s%> a small <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> like a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand,<s%> is <S%H5927>rising<s%> out of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H631><s%> 'Get ready and go <S%H3381>down,<s%> so that the <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H6113>doesn't<s%> stop you.'"

It happened in a little <S%H3541>while,<s%> that the <S%H8064>sky<s%> grew <S%H6937>black<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds<s%> and <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1653>rain.<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7392>rode,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on <S%H452>Elijah;<s%> and he <S%H8151>tucked<s%> his cloak into his <S%H4975>belt<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
